edge: Dum Laga Ke Haisha is a Bollywood movie.
The story of the movie Dum Laga Ke Haisha is set in Haridwar.
The story of the movie Dum Laga Ke Haisha is set in Rishikesh.
Dum Laga Ke Haisha is entirely shot in the twin temple towns of Haridwar and Rishikesh.
The script of Dum Laga Ke Haisha was written in 2007.
Bhumi Pednekar was selected for the female lead in Dum Laga Ke Haisha, making this her debut film.
As a result of being selected for the female lead in Dum Laga Ke Haisha, Bhumi Pednekar gained 30 kg.
